snippet.title: Slitherine Next 2024 | Broken Arrow - Interview
snippet.description:
Steel Balalaika and Slitherine personnel give an update on the development of Broken Arrow.

Broken Arrow is a large-scale real-time modern warfare tactics game.
A unique army building system and deep units customization tools allow for endless replayability.
With 300+ realistic military units and technologies, each battle is more immersive than ever before.

🎮 Wishlist it on Steam ➡️ http://steam.gs/l/4c3nk
💬 Join the Discord Server ➡️ https://discord.com/invite/pZYT46Z
🦎 More info on Slitherine ➡️ https://bit.ly/3yfbaXc
